Usage
Select mode

Typical operations

  • Selecting single chip ... Click the chip you'd like to select
  • Selecting multiple chips ... Besiege the chips by dragging
  • Add one more chip to be selected ... Ctrl + left click on the chip
  • Add multiple chips to be selected ... Besiege the chip by Ctrl + dragging
  • Cancel single chip from selected chips ... Ctrl + right click on the chip
  • Move selected chips ... Drag selected chips
  • Show context menu ... Right click
  • Cut, copy or delete selected chips ... Right click, and select "Cut selected chip(s)", "Copy selected chip(s)" or "Delete selected chip(s)"
  • Paste chips ... Right click where you'd like to paste. and select "Paste chip(s)"
  • Change bar length ... Right click in the favorite bar, and select "Change part length"
  • Insert or delete bar ... Right click in the favorite bar, and select "Insert part" or "Delete part".
